statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport;
SELECT location_lat, location_long FROM public_transport ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type FROM public_transport WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM public_transport WHERE location_long < 0;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, status FROM public_transport ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM public_transport GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM public_transport WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_long < 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, status FROM public_transport ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(location_lat), MIN(location_long) FROM public_transport;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, status FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT current_location, vehicle_type FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'bus';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_statuses ORDER BY status_update_datetime DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM vehicle_statuses WHERE status = 'maintenance' AND vehicle_id = 101;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM public_transport_vehicles;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT vehicle_id, status_update_datetime FROM vehicle_statuses ORDER BY status_update_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE current_location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE status = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, location_lat, location_long FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT * FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT last_updated, status FROM VehicleStatus WHERE vehicle_id = 456
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM RouteSchedule
SELECT * FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND location_lat > 30
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(location_long) FROM VehicleLocation GROUP BY vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, location_lat, location_long FROM VehicleLocation WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01'
SELECT RouteSchedule.route_id, RouteSchedule.departure_time, VehicleLocation.location_lat FROM RouteSchedule INNER JOIN VehicleLocation ON RouteSchedule.vehicle_id = VehicleLocation.vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, status, last_updated FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM vehicle
SELECT vehicle_name, last_status FROM vehicle
SELECT route_id, vehicle_name, last_location FROM vehicle
SELECT route_name FROM route
SELECT vehicle_id, location, timestamp FROM location_history
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, last_location FROM vehicle WHERE last_status = 'Active';
SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.location, sh.status, sh.timestamp FROM location_history vh INNER JOIN status_history sh ON vh.vehicle_id = sh.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_locations FROM location_history GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY total_locations DESC;

SELECT v.vehicle_name, r.route_name, lh.location, sh.status FROM vehicle v INNER JOIN route r ON v.route_id = r.route_id INNER JOIN location_history lh ON v.vehicle_id = lh.vehicle_id INNER JOIN status_history sh ON v.vehicle_id = sh.vehicle_id WHERE sh.status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM public_transport_vehicles;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes;
SELECT vehicle_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM vehicle_schedule;
SELECT alert_id, vehicle_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM vehicle_alerts;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC
SELECT vehicle_name, status FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_long < 50
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM vehicle_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' AND arrival_time < '2022-02-01'
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM vehicle_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
